name: getsar
short_description:
This script is made to work with the sar2html utility, found here:
https://sourceforge.net/projects/sar2html/

It provides extra features to help automate sar data collection, as well as maintain a sar2html installation over time.

Features:

Download and import sar data from a host into sar2html on-demand

Run batch update jobs on multiple sar2html dump files, either by pulling them from a list of servers, or importing them from an upload directory.

Clean out temporary files generated during use of the sar2html site

Trim your compiled sar2html data files according to how many months of data you want to keep.

Nagios integration: will make use of nsca to send Nagios alerts if there are any issues updating performance data for a host when using the "update" option.

Made to work with sar2html v.2.3.2. This project is separate from the sar2html project, so please do NOT ask the sar2html developer for help with this script.
summary: Assists with automation/management of sar2html jobs

audience.fullpath: Intended Audience :: by End-User Class :: System Administrators
